ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Update a TSP Account
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Update a TSP Account
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Update a TSP Account

Update a user's TSP account. **Scopes:** `tsp:write:admin` `tsp:write`

Method: Patch

OperationID: userTSPUpdate

EndPoint:

/users/{userId}/tsp/{tspId}

Usage: dial_in_numbers[]

[{ "code": "%code%", "number": "%number%", "type": "%type%", "country_label": "%country_label%" }]
